description: At Br&newweddings we specialise in creating one of a kind stationery for each and every couple. We donâ€™t work from templates which means that your stationery suite will be completely unique and exclusive to you and your day.
exhibitText:
Having had my first baby back in October I am now slowly starting to take on new weddings again for summer 2019. Hooray! 
There is also some exciting news in the pipeline as we try and make the business work for our new lives with little man in tow. Watch this space!
